title: Health Discourse Research Initiative
snippet: Mentions Fabio Giglietto from the University of Urbino Carlo Bo as part of a team working to identify coordinated link-sharing networks on Facebook, focusing on health information in Nigeria and India. This is part of the Media Ecosystems Analysis Group's (MEAG) work with the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation to research mis/disinformation in global health.
description: The "Health Discourse Research Initiative" page mentions Fabio Giglietto from the University of Urbino Carlo Bo as part of a team studying misinformation on Facebook related to health information in Nigeria and India, as part of the MEAG's work with the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation.

title: SICSS-Bologna - Summer Institute in Computational Social Science
snippet: Lists Fabio Giglietto as an Associate Professor at the University of Urbino Carlo Bo, whose research focuses on the interplay between digital media and societal transformations, particularly on how digital platforms influence public opinion and democratic processes. He is described as a prominent figure in Internet Studies.
description: This webpage from the Summer Institute in Computational Social Science (SICSS) - Bologna lists Fabio Giglietto as a faculty member, highlighting his research on digital media, public opinion, and democratic processes.

title: Giornata Internazionale di Studi - Can the Damage of Destructive Polarization Be Repaired?
snippet: Fabio Giglietto (University of Urbino Carlo Bo) co-authored a study titled "The Brazilian Digital Battlefield: Investigating The Dynamics Of Political Information Campaigns In Post-Bolsonaro Era" with Giada Marino and Bruna Almeida Paroni, which investigates the dynamics of misinformation campaigns on Facebook in the context of Brazil's political shifts.
description: This web mention references Fabio Giglietto (University of Urbino Carlo Bo) as a co-author of a study on misinformation campaigns in Brazil following political shifts. The study, "The Brazilian Digital Battlefield," investigates dynamics on Facebook.

title: Research Radio - Apple Podcasts
snippet: Fabio Giglietto curates this podcast, where AI-generated deep dives into computational social science research papers are presented.
description: This podcast, curated by Fabio Giglietto, presents AI-generated deep dives into computational social science research papers, aligning with his expertise in social media research and computational social science.

title: View of Integrating Large Language Models in Political Discourse Studies on Social Media: Challenges of Validating an LLMs-in-the-loop Pipeline | Sociologica
snippet: Fabio Giglietto is mentioned as an Associate Professor of Internet Studies at the University of Urbino Carlo Bo, whose research delves into the impact of information theory, media, and digital technologies on society. Giglietto's (2024) research on the same dataset demonstrated that LLMs outperform fully fine-tuned transformer models in NLP tasks.
description: The article mentions Fabio Giglietto as an Associate Professor of Internet Studies at the University of Urbino Carlo Bo and references his 2024 research on LLMs in NLP tasks using social media datasets.
